attributes.action: Do not demand compulsory vaccinations to enter any venue or business in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: The covid vaccine is still experimental and so no one should be discriminated against for choosing not to take the vaccine. They should be free to enter clubs, pubs or any business regardless of their vaccination status.
attributes.background: Stop the plan to demand compulsory vaccinations to enter any venue or business in the UK

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
